description.narrative: Funding under this investment supports the innovationXchange's (iXc) program on technology for development, including support for: strategic research and program design on technology for development working together with geographic aid programming areas, and the International Cyber Engagement Strategy; and working in Papua New Guinea on digital transformation. This engagement will strengthen the Australian Department of Foreign Affairs and Trade’s capability to appropriately use technology to more effectively deliver aid outcomes and to identify the most catalytic investment opportunities to support development outcomes with technology. The total value of this investment is $0.4 million over 2 finnacial years, starting 2017-18.
